column5: I need glasses for reading. I just got out of the shower. DO you think they could make the labeling of shampoo and conditioner smaller. I can't see it. So every time I have to guess. 80% of the time I 'm wrong and try to wash with conditioner. I know they come in different colour bottles. But I have more important things to worry about. Like paying the mortgage.
You think thjats bad... try getting through to an actual person at bell canada... theres a 1/2 hour of my life ill never get back this morning.
You think thats bad. I finally get the engineers that designed the equipment i work on.

You pay your mortgage while in the shower washing your hair? Wow that's some awesome multitasking. But how do you keep your laptop from getting wet? I'm briefly on the cellphone sometimes while in the shower, but you take it to a whole new level.     Maybe scratch the conditioner bottle cap with a knife and then you can tell which is which be feeling it. I did that to my left earbud so I can tell which is the the left one when playing my mp3 player in the dark.
Make sure you don't use the pink razor either Paul...lol Maybe time to put your shampoo in a 'special' bottle. At least you didn't grab the 'Neat'...lmao.
You think that's bad?... try mistaking the Icy Hot menthol muscle cream for the Preparation H one time!!!
Rick, LOL. One thing, If I grab the Neat. My problem would be solved.

And the biggest problem is usually I am calling them monthly to fix billing issues and other nonsense that they created in the first place. I find that if you don't watch what they are doing, they will add things and your bill will go up. They do that to all of us and most don't bother to call because of the hassle on the phone.  Sorry for the rant and Hi Jacking your thread Tybo  I feel better now!!
you think that's bad?  I just get to wash my hair with a wash cloth!!!!!

If I may be so bold as to suggest:  Take Joey into the shower with you and get her to do your hair...  May as well scrub your back while she is waiting the time you have to leave the conditioner on before rinsing...
Works for us Paul  .

Damm i thought i was the only one that the shampoo and conditioner bottles bothered ! Some are right side up some are upside down each one is different.  I solved my problem by taking a black marker and putting a big s or c on the bottle before they are allowed in the shower. It saved a lot of cursing every day.
Another fix is to NOt be a woman... with the whole separate bottles and use trusty ole Head and Shoulders.... hahahahah
See!!! this is what this forum is all about... Paul gets to vent here and the lunchtime crowd at some diner is safe!
Personally I would have like to see Paul in the lead roll in Falling Down..  http://www.imdb.com/title/tt0106856/  If ya haven't seen it its pretty good.
That's an oldie!!!... "You missed   !"
you think thats bad??? try brushing your teeth with deep heat rub....  you think thats bad ??? at least you have hair to worry about washing ...
TJ, Ever since seeing that movie.I will only venture out in public when it is absolutely necessary. SNAP
Tell Joey to keep her conditioner out of the shower when she is not using it and you wont have that problem.You need a little pimp hand there brother.Hope Bex doesnt see this post... Joe
With a Magic Marker put a big S on the shampoo and a big C on the conditioner...
You mean shampoo and condition comes in separate bottles..  ??
i agree what ever happened to guys using 2 in 1 ... shampoo and conditioner together??? makes my life very easy!
That's why you drank my beer instead of yours... couldn't read the label aye.....
